article_title: Among battleground states, Obama's Ohio approval rating the worst
article_text:
Total Access

article_metadata.description: Of the three top presidential battleground states, Ohioans have soured on President Barack Obama the most. However, just as in Florida and Pennsylvania, voters in Ohio prefer some of Obama’s policies more than those of his GOP opponents, a new Quinnipiac Poll shows.
